text: This video can not be playedK-pop sensation Jung Joon-Young said anyone looking to make in Korea's pop music industry (K-pop) needs to 'practice'.His first break came from a TV audition show, although he had played in amateur bands before that.He says you have to "prepare and work" to get into K-pop.Watch more reports on Asia Business Report's website.
title: K-pop star Jung Joon-Young says 'practice' essential
